#summary List of journal papers that make use of ADDA

Below we list the papers that use results of simulations using *ADDA*. Those (review) papers, which only mention *ADDA*, are not included. If you know a paper that should be included here please leave a comment below or contact [mailto:DaviddeKanterUvA@gmail.com David de Kanter].
